entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is a person who is giving instructions to the champions. She is described as saying 'We are going to be patrolling the outside of the maze'.

entities.name: champions
entities.description: The champions are a group of people who are being addressed by Professor McGonagall. They are described as nodding in response to her instructions.

entities.name: bagman
entities.description: Bagman is a person who is giving encouragement and instructions to the four patrollers. He is described as saying 'Off you go, then!'

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is a person who is wishing Harry good luck. He is described as whispering 'Good luck, Harry'.

entities.name: four patrollers
entities.description: The four patrollers are a group of people who are being sent to station themselves around the maze. They are described as walking away in different directions.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a person who is being wished good luck by Hagrid. He is not explicitly mentioned as doing anything else in this passage.

entities.name: maze
entities.description: The maze is a location where the champions will be patrolling and where the four patrollers will be stationed.

entities.name: stands
entities.description: The stands are a location where Bagman's voice can be heard. They are described as being filled with people who are listening to his announcement.

relationships.description: Professor McGonagall is addressing the champions, giving them instructions on how to patrol the maze.
Bagman is sending the four patrollers to station themselves around the maze.
Hagrid is wishing Harry good luck as he sends him off to patrol the maze.
